title: DateTime Display Format
description: Display format for datetime values. Controls how datetimes are presented to users, not how they are stored. Storage always uses ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ). Common formats: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm (ISO-like), MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm A (US 12-hour), DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm (European 24-hour).

specs.title: Accept valid datetime format
specs.when: user sets format to 'MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm A'
specs.then: the format is accepted and datetimes display in US 12-hour format

specs.title: Use default format when not specified
specs.given: a datetime field configuration without format property
specs.then: the datetime is displayed in default format (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm)

specs.title: Reject invalid format tokens
specs.then: validation error is returned with message 'Invalid datetime format pattern'

specs.title: Display with 12-hour format
specs.given: a datetime field with format 'hh:mm A'
specs.then: the time is displayed as '02:30 PM'
